footer: No ads, no tracking. Enjoy your day!
usesBio: In case you were wondering, here's a list of all the gear that I use. This list is always changing, as I'm always trying out new things and looking to improve my setup.
statsBio: Here's a some cool and interesting statistics about me, and my social accounts across different platforms that update on a daily basis
privacyBio: This Privacy Policy is meant to help you understand what information I collect, why I collect it, and your privacy rights. This policy is applicable to all websites and pieces of software made by me under this domain
musicBio: I listen to a mix of music from Hindi, English, and Punjabi - and my favourite genre is rap!
artistBio: I've been listening to Talhah Yunus a lot more these days
amaBio: Not sure if this is a good idea, or not... but I saw a few people add this to their websites so I did it too. Feel free to ask away, can be the most random crap in the world. Questions will only appear here after I respond, so I'll do my best to respond to all your questions.
aboutBio: Hello, my name is Benoît Clemenceau.
projectBio: Here are a few projects I've worked on. I try to explain why and how I built them.
blogBio: Here you can find the articles I wrote. I talk about dev, tech, and life in general. These posts are also available on dev.to and Medium.
